UnlockModeDescription: Unlock All: If this option is not selected, some features may still be unlocked. Make sure you have disabled the [Unlock All] option in Find It! mod. Custom Unlock: Although custom unlock options take effect when the game refreshes milestones. Note: It is recommended to enable this before starting the game. The [Unlock All] option in Find It! mod only unlocks all assets in the Find It! menu, but does not unlock milestones.
AddMoneyTooltip: Make sure Money Anarchy feature is enabled
AllowsDynamicToggling: This option allows dynamic toggle within game
MaximizeAttractiveness: Maximize attractiveness, will attract more tourists
MaximizeEducationCoverage: Maximize education coverage, still need schools to get educated citizens
MaximizeEntertainment: Maximize entertainment, will improve citizens' happiness
MaximizeLandValue: Maximize the land value of city
OptionPanelCategoriesHorizontalOffsetMin: This option takes effect after adjustment
OptionPanelCategoriesUpdated: Show mod updated date in options panel categories
OptionPanelCategoriesUpdatedMinor: This option only takes effect after refreshing the plugins list or restarting the game
OptionsPanelHorizontalOffset: Options panel categories bar horizontal offset
PutOutBurningBuildingsDescription: This is not a permanent fire removal feature and will only be called once to remove all buildings that are on fire. Are you sure you want to put out burning buildings?
RemoveCrime: Remove criminals from all buildings and maximize police service coverage
RemoveDeath: Remove dead citizens and maximize death care coverage
RemoveNotEnoughMoneyMinor: When Money Anarchy or Unlimited Money is enabled, this option is enabled automatically enforced.
SortSettings: Sort mods names in options panel
StartMoneyMinor: Set value before you start gaming. If you don't want money to be this value every time you load save, disable this feature after enabling it once, if you load save, the money will change after the game simulation starts.
UnlimitedMoneyConflict: Game Anarchy also extended money anarchy function, allowing manual add money, automatic add money, check Game Anarchy option panel.
UnlimitedOilAndOreConflict: Game Anarchy also can adjuster consumption rate, check Game Anarchy control panel in game.
UnlockAllConflict: Game Anarchy also extend the custom unlock, check Game Anarchy option panel.
UnlockBasicRoadsMinor: Unlock some basic roads, including some multi-lane roads
UnlockUniqueBuildingMinor: Unlock all unique buildings at levels 1 through 6. Due to game restrictions, if this option is forced to be unlocked, a small number of buildings will be unlocked, but not all.
AchievementForciblyEnabled: The achievement system has been forcibly enabled
Changelog_v1_0_0_Added: Added unlimited placement of festival area buildings.
Changelog_v1_0_0_Fixed: Fixed control panel settings sometimes not automatically save.
Changelog_v1_0_1_Fixed: Fixed an issue where normal buildings could only be placed once.
Changelog_v1_0_1_Fixed1: Fixed an issue where the mod would not work at all when loading the config file incorrectly.
Changelog_v1_1_0_Added1: Added put out burning buildings feature.
Changelog_v1_1_0_Added2: Added unlimited place treasure hunt buildings feature.
Changelog_v1_1_0_Added3: Integrated [You Can Build It] mod functions.
Changelog_v1_1_0_Fixed: Fixed an issue where unlock public transport was not fully unlocked.
Changelog_v1_1_0_Fixed1: Fixed an issue where unlimited oil, unlimited ore is not working properly.
Changelog_v1_1_0_Optimized: Optimize unlock info view performance issues.
Changelog_v1_1_0_Updated: UUI button and separate tool button are now optional.
Changelog_v1_1_0_Updated2: Updated compatibility check. When three built-in unlimited mods are detected to be enabled, they are automatically disabled to ensure mod compatibility.
Changelog_v1_1_1_Fixed: Fixed an issue where the remove not enough money limitation function could not take effect.
Changelog_v1_1_1_Fixed1: Fixed some issues with the control panel.
Changelog_v1_1_2_Fixed: Fixed an issue where achievements didn't work properly.
Changelog_v1_1_4_Fixed: Fixed an issue where the fire station would not send out vehicles after remove fire was enabled.
Changelog_v1_3_0_Fixed: Fixed exception thrown when toggling achievement system before game.
Changelog_v1_3_0_Attention: This update automatically resets all settings.
